perturbation.original_text: (a) "Arizona Assigned Copyrights" means all Copyrights, whether registered or unregistered, owned by Licensing or Seller as of the Effective Date and used or held for use exclusively in the Company Field as of November 14, 2018 (the "SPA Signing Date") and/or as of the Effective Date.
perturbation.changed_text: (a) "Arizona Assigned Copyrights" means all Copyrights, whether registered or unregistered, owned by Licensing or Seller as of the Effective Date and used or held for use exclusively in the Company Field as of November 14, 2018 (the "SPA Signing Date").
perturbation.explanation: By removing the phrase "and/or as of the Effective Date" from the definition of 'Arizona Assigned Copyrights', we create a contradiction. Initially, the copyrights had to be used exclusively in the Company Field on either the SPA Signing Date or the Effective Date. The modified version omits the 'Effective Date', implying the copyright must now be used exclusively in the Company Field on the SPA Signing Date.

perturbation.original_text: 3.1 Arizona Copyright Grant. Subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement, Arizona hereby grants to the Company a perpetual, non- exclusive, royalty-free license in, to and under the Arizona Licensed Copyrights for use in the Company Field throughout the world.
perturbation.changed_text: 3.1 Arizona Copyright Grant. Subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement, Arizona hereby grants to the Company a temporary, non- exclusive, royalty-free license in, to and under the Arizona Licensed Copyrights for use in the Company Field throughout the world.
perturbation.explanation: Changing the term 'perpetual' to 'temporary' creates a direct contradiction. The original text grants a never-ending license, while the modified text implies a limited duration. This contradiction creates uncertainty about the license's term and enforceability.

perturbation.original_text: 12.1 Term and Termination. (a) Unless earlier terminated pursuant to the provisions hereof, the term of this Agreement and the licenses and other grants of rights (and related obligations) under this Agreement shall (i) with respect to the Arizona Licensed Trademarks, be for the Arizona Trademark License Term, (ii) with respect to the Diamond Licensed Trademarks, be for the Diamond Trademark License Term, (iii) with respect to the Phase- Out Marks, be for the term set forth in Section 6.6, and (iv) with respect to Copyrights, Know-How and Patents, be in perpetuity.
perturbation.changed_text: 12.1 Term and Termination. (a) Unless earlier terminated pursuant to the provisions hereof, the term of this Agreement and the licenses and other grants of rights (and related obligations) under this Agreement shall (i) with respect to the Arizona Licensed Trademarks, be for the Arizona Trademark License Term, (ii) with respect to the Diamond Licensed Trademarks, be for the Diamond Trademark License Term, (iii) with respect to the Phase- Out Marks, be for the term set forth in Section 6.6, and (iv) with respect to Copyrights, Know-How and Patents, be in perpetuity unless revoked.
perturbation.explanation: Adding the words 'unless revoked' to the phrase related to 'Copyrights, Know-How and Patents' creates a contradiction. The original text mentions that the agreement is set to be in perpetuity but adding 'unless revoked' makes the the period undefined.
